title: 混沌時代之隨筆紀錄
content: 簡易了解了幾個 MD 語法，測試可以用這裡喔~ 這是大標題 只需要打 # 就可以了反斜線 \ 可用於保留字元上~在打 >hexo new [layout] <標題> 時 <標題> 用””雙引號分割喔! notion 會用 markdown 底線呢??? ===

title: My New Post
content: 此文章只是表示成功創建了一篇文章，跟印出”Hello World”是同樣的道理…

title: Hello World
content: 喔不，這個我不想刪掉ㄟ… Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentationfor more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
